Title: Prohibits employers from using workplace surveillance tools to surveil employees in private, off-duty areas or a worker's residence, vehicle or property
Summary: Prohibits employers from using workplace surveillance tools to surveil employees in private, off-duty areas or a worker's residence, vehicle or property; defines terms; establishes penalties for violations of such provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to prohibiting the surveillance of workers in private, off-duty areas or a worker's residence, vehicle or property
